name: Grass Simulator 2022
description:
You are grass.

-Can choose between day and night before hosting server (yes its multiplayer)

-No pausing, why would you want to anyway?

-Grass can't move.

How to Host a multiplayer game:

Go to host game, choose day or night then port foward the port 7777 with udp and

then send your friends your ip adress for them to connect (you can find out your ip adress by just typing "whats my ip adress" into google)
